text: Blood Beach is a 1980 American horror movie directed by Jeffrey Bloom and starring David Huffman, Marianna Hill, Otis Young, Burt Young, John Saxon. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:1980s monster movies Category:American monster movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:American independent movies Category:1980 independent movies Category:Movies set on beaches
title: Blood Beach
